title: Carbonic Watchface
summary: Show off your new wearable with a cool and simple metallic watchface!
description: Carbonic Watchface is an app for wearable devices powered by Android Wear. descriptionHTML:
Carbonic Watchface is an app for wearable devices powered by Android Wear. It adds Carbonic to the list of watchfaces available for setting.

Features
- Tells time in 12-hour or 24-hour format
- Shows date and day of the week
- Energy saving mode (two colors and no animation)

Note: There is no companion app at the moment. Just install and resync apps in the Android Wear app.

Get the latest information!
[Newsletter]
http://kemcogame.com/c8QM
[Facebook page]
http://www.facebook.com/kemco.global

comments: Needs 12hr option After 12hr option, will change to 5 stars. Well done!
